item.title: 32-player classic-adventure battle royale Scramble Knights Royale announced for Xbox Series, PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Xbox Series

Compete against fellow knights to win the favor of the princess.

Funktronic Labs has announced Scramble Knights Royale, a 32-player classic-adventure battle royale where players compete against fellow knights to win the favor of the princess. It will launch for Xbox Series and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via Funktronic Labs:

About

Welcome to Scramble Knights Royale! Compete against fellow knights in a 32-player classic-adventure battle royale. Be the last knight standing and win the favor of the princess!

Jump off the starting boat and sail on the back of a turtle towards the shore to begin your journey at the start of a new match.

Explore and Discover

Traverse an archipelago filled with life, puzzles, dungeons, and treasures! Every run is a unique adventure. Prepare by finding loot and completing quests as the ring closes to force every knight closer together.

Power Fantasy

Grow stronger with new weapons, armor, and accessories that you discover or purchase. Visit a blacksmith to spend your gems and upgrade your gear. Make strategic equipment choices to create powerful builds.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Scramble It Out

When you’re face to face with another knight, you’ll need to out-skill them in strategic combat with the build you forged. Every weapon has tons of different moves to master and the world is filled with fun environments to brawl in.

Key Features

  • Homestead – Your home away from battle, decorate it with items as you progress and relax with your friends!
  • Get Your Drip – Tons of customization options you earn from playing during different seasons.
  • Play Together – Queue together in free-for-all, or team up when we launch duo queue later this year.
  • Online Split-Screen – Play together in local cooperative split-screen online! Now you just need a friend to play with!
  • Cluck Around and Find Out – If you die, you can watch the rest of the match as a chicken.

Watch the announcement trailer and first gameplay footage below. View the first screenshots at the gallery. Visit the official website here.

Announce Trailer

Announce Gameplay

item.title: Devolver Digital, Deconstructeam, and Selkie Harbour announce Virtue and a Sledgehammer for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Therapy? How about a sledgehammer?

Publisher Devolver Digital and developers Deconstructeam and Selkie Harbour have announced action adventure game Virtue and a Sledgehammer. It will launch for PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Most people resort to therapy. But you chose the brave option. A sledgehammer.

In Virtue and a Sledgehammer, explore the remains of your hometown haunted by the android ghosts of your digitized neighbors. There won’t always be a clear path, so create your own by knocking down any structures that stand in your way.

It will be a painful journey, not only because of the assault from the robots that have taken over life in the mountains, but because of the memories you’ll unearth—sometimes warm, but often traumatic—as you destroy the remnants of your childhood.

A game about family, traditions, and being a misfit.

20 Pounds of Physical Media

Wield your sledgehammer like an instrument of reckoning, swinging through the swathes of mechanical human facsimiles and the buildings they call home. But will violent catharsis salve your soul, or make the pain burn brighter?

  • ❮
  • ❯

A Narrative Experience at Heart

You can’t tear down the place you were born without awakening a few ghosts. The cinematic sequences of interactive fiction will reveal your fears, desires, and your family’s knotty web of virtues and flaws.

I Wish You Could Experience Life Without Pain

Flesh is a source of aches and tainted humors.

It’s only now, devoid of bones, devoid of hunger, that I can tell you…

I have never been happier.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer and Developer Introduction



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/devolver-digital-deconstructeam-and-selkie-harbour-announce-virtue-and-a-sledgehammer-for-pc

item.title: Atmospheric lucid dream survival horror game Lucid Falls announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

"Fight to survive in surreal, horrifying worlds."

Eldamar Studios has announced Lucid Falls, a survival horror game where players will manipulate gravity, space, and time, and survive terrifying nightmares in an atmospheric lucid dream. It will be available for PC via Steam.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Trapped inside a lucid dream, fight to survive in surreal, horrifying worlds, facing terrifying creatures, shifting gravity to navigate impossible spaces, and solving challenges that bend reality, as every moment pulls you closer to the dark truth behind Lucid Falls.

Lucid Falls began with one idea: to make a dream feel real. It is our vision, and now it is time to share it with you.

Key Features

  • Unique Gameplay – Manipulate reality itself by altering gravity, space, and time to uncover hidden paths and solve puzzles.
  • Realistic Combat – Fight and survive against terrifying, grotesque creatures born straight from hell.
  • It’s Not Just Horror – It is how the world feels, moves, and responds. Lucid Falls is all about mood. The atmosphere drives the entire experience.
  • Cinematic Adventure – Cinematic visuals and atmospheric environments bring nightmares to life, with grotesque creatures lurking in every shadow.

Watch the announcement trailer below. Visit the official website here.

Announce Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Rift of the NecroDancer DLC ‘Friday Night Funkin’ Music Pack’ now available
item.content:encoded:
Brace Yourself Games, in cooperation with Kawai Sprite, has released Rift of the NecroDancer downloadable content “Friday Night Funkin’ Music Pack.”

The “Friday Night Funkin’ Music Pack” Consists of the following content:

  • “Dad Battle” by Kawai Sprite (free to download)
  • “Blammed” by Kawai Sprite
  • “Stress” by Kawai Sprite
  • “Darnell” by Kawai Sprite
  • “Ugh” by Kawai Sprite
  • “Senpai” by Kawai Sprite

Each song can be purchased individually for $1.99.

Rift of the NecroDancer is available now for Switch and PC via Steam.

Watch a trailer below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

DLC “Friday Night Funkin’ Music Pack” Trailer

Screenshots

  • ❯
